titles.title: Genetic Privacy and Nondiscrimination Act of 2003
To amend the Public Health Service Act to prohibit health discrimination against individuals and their family members on the basis of genetic information, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 11/21/2003--Introduced. Genetic Privacy and Nondiscrimination Act of 2003 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to prohibit a group or individual health care plan or health insurance issuer from restricting enrollment or adjusting premium or contribution amounts on the basis of predictive genetic information about an individual or family member of such individual.
